ai-patthana8.57:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.57:1.1_0: Not seeing should be given up, relying on not give up.
ai-patthana8.57:2.1_0: One should not give up anger and distress to give up three things.
ai-patthana8.57:3.1_0: Not should be given up and rejected. Nor should be given up by relying on not give up.
ai-patthana8.57:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
